targets.rawSql:
with livingroom_t as (
    select device_id
    from shelly_gen2_temperature
    where device_name LIKE '%livingroom' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
)

select 
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(tC),
    left(concat(device_name, '-', device_id), 24) as metric
from
    shelly_gen2_temperature
where
    (
        (device_name like '%livingroom%')
        or (device_id in (select device_id from livingroom_t) and device_id = device_name)
    )
    and idx = '0'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

with livingroom_t as (
    select ieee_address
    from zigbee2mqtt_shelly_bluhtdisplayzb
    where friendly_name LIKE '%livingroom' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
)

select 
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(temperature),
    left(concat(friendly_name, ieee_address), 24) as metric
from
    zigbee2mqtt_shelly_bluhtdisplayzb
where
    (
        (friendly_name like '%livingroom%')
        or (ieee_address in (select ieee_address from livingroom_t) and ieee_address = friendly_name)
    )
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

with livingroom_t as (
    select device_id
    from shelly_gen2_blutrv
    where device_name LIKE '%livingroom' and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
)

select 
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(current_C),
    left(concat(device_name, device_id), 24) as metric

where

        (device_name like '%livingroom%')
        or (device_id in (select device_id from livingroom_t) and device_id = device_name)
    )
    and idx = '200'
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

sample by $__interval fill(null)

select

    avg(tC) as tC,
    device_name as metric
from
    shelly_gen2_temperature
where
    device_name not like '%outdoor%' 
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

sample by $__interval fill(null)

sample by $__interval fill(null)

where
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

panels.description: total for a given time range

targets.rawSql:
WITH
shelly_gen2_switch_b AS (
    SELECT
        timestamp AS ts,
        device_name,
        apower,
        lag(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY device_name ORDER BY timestamp) AS prev_ts,
    FROM shelly_gen2_switch
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
)
SELECT
    $__time(0),
    device_name,
    sum(apower*(datediff('u', ts, prev_ts)))/(3600.0*1000000) as value
FROM shelly_gen2_switch_b
WHERE prev_ts IS NOT NULL
GROUP by device_name

WITH
zigbee2mqtt_sonoff_s60zbtpf_b AS (
    SELECT
        timestamp AS ts,
        friendly_name,
        power,
        lag(timestamp) OVER (PARTITION BY friendly_name ORDER BY timestamp) AS prev_ts,
    FROM zigbee2mqtt_sonoff_s60zbtpf
    WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
)
SELECT
    $__time(0),
    friendly_name as device_name,
    sum(power*(datediff('u', ts, prev_ts)))/(3600.0*1000000) as value
FROM zigbee2mqtt_sonoff_s60zbtpf_b
WHERE prev_ts IS NOT NULL
GROUP by friendly_name

panels.title: total power consumption

targets.rawSql:
select 
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(tC) as tC,
    device_name as metric
from
    shelly_gen2_temperature
where
    device_name like '%outdoor%' 
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select 
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(rh) as rh,
    concat(device_name, '-rh') as metric
from
    shelly_gen2_humidity
where
    device_name like '%outdoor%' 
    and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

sample by $__interval fill(null)

select

select

from
    shelly_gen2_devicepower
where
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

select 
    $__time(timestamp),
    avg(battery) as battery,
    concat(friendly_name, '-', ieee_address) as metric

    zigbee2mqtt_shelly_bluhtdisplayzb

    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)

    avg(battery) as battery,
    concat(friendly_name, '-', ieee_address) as metric
from
    zigbee2mqtt_sonoff_snzb02wd
where
    $__timeFilter(timestamp)
sample by $__interval fill(null)
